flawed_nl_solution:
If there are 2000 pies of all kinds, and 17/25 of all pies are eaten with forks, there are 17/25*2000= <<17/25*2000=50000/17>>50000/17 pies eaten with forks.
The number of pies that are not eaten with pie is 2000-50000/17=<<2000-50000/17=-16000/17>>-16000/17

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1360, not 50000/17. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
